name: Define - Find the Difference
description:
Best game for you&your family! Play for free!

Spot & Find the difference its a simple game where you need to find the differences between two pictures. All pictures have beautiful unique design.

Improve your observation skills, train and relax your brain by playing find the difference or classic spot the difference game. If you get stuck, you can use the Hint to reveal one difference.
OUR NEW BONUS LEVEL can set a brand new challenge for you! Have you ever tried to catch the difference that is running away from you?! You need to set priorities now and act fast!

How to play:
1. Find the difference between two pictures that look similar, but there are 5 differences to find!
2. When you find a different object, tap on it as fast as possible to spot the difference!
3. Pass daily challenges and collect stars!
4. Pass month challenge and get access to a bonus level!

Game features:

- 500+ unique and beautiful levels
- Hints will help you find the most difficult differences
- Automatic online progress save
- Don't need a lot of space on your device
- Easy to play
- Tutorial - learn how to play on the first level
- Bonus levels
- Works on every iOS device - iPhone, iPad and iPod


It is a nice and free puzzle game, that will help you relax and spend your time with pleasure. If you enjoy playing games like hidden objects or detectives this puzzle game is perfect for you!

Download now! 100% free game!
